title: MyCourses
description: This platform serves as a centralized space for sharing and discovering courses in STEM subjects and languages. Whether you're passionate about mathematics, science, technology, or languages, you can easily find suitable courses here. Teachers can showcase the courses they offer, both offline and online, while learners can explore and enroll in them effortlessly. It's a user-friendly platform designed to connect educators and students seamlessly, eliminating the hassle of endless searches and missed opportunities.

title: Feast
description: Feast is an online restaurant booking system where users can reserve tables for up to 10 guests on a specific date and time. Registration is required to make or manage reservations. Users can edit or cancel their bookings, with each email address limited to one reservation to ensure efficient communication for future updates, including confirmation emails.

title: Find The Bunny
description: This is an engaging and delightful game crafted to bring joy to players of all ages. Whether you're seeking a quick break or a brief moment of amusement, this game offers a perfect 20-second escape into a whimsical world of fun. Developed with precision and creativity.

title: Snowman
description: Snowman is an exciting word guessing game where players try to uncover a secret word by guessing its letters. With each incorrect guess, players lose a life. If they run out of lives before guessing the word, they lose the game. However, if they successfully guess the word in time, they emerge victorious! Ready to take on the challenge and test your word-solving skills?

title: JustAMap
description: JustMap is a cool website made with React. It uses Mapbox API to show maps and help you find your way. You can explore different places, get directions, and find interesting spots. Whether you're planning a trip or just checking out new areas, JustMap makes it easy and fun.

title: ../Foodie
description: Foodie is more than just a food blogâ€”it's a personal culinary sanctuary. Here, the owner delights in sharing her food experiences and expertise with fellow food enthusiasts.
